articles.title: U.S. administration's anti-DPRK moves blasted
articles.content:
Preparatory committee inaugurated in Jordan 
    Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- A Jordanian preparatory committee was inaugurated in Amman on March 15 to commemorate Sun's Day, the birthday of President Kim Il Sung.
 At the inaugural meeting the chairman of the Jordanian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.   
 The committee decided to hold colorful events from March 15 to April 15.
